article_title: Changes In Medicare Improve Quality Of Care, But At What Cost?

article_metadata.author: Robert Pearl, M.D.

og.description: The Affordable Care Act (ACA) has changed Medicare for the better, and produced higher quality of care for patients. But whether the new shifts in Medicare policy will lower the total cost of health care, remains unclear.
